#summary Definition of t_feed_protocol

= t_feed_protocol =

The t_feed_protocol table defines the two protocols, request & response.  A feed protocol is used to define the protocol of a feed in t_feed.

|| *Key* || *Name* || *Type* || *Null* || *Description* ||
|| PK || feed_protocol_id || varchar(10) || No || Uniquely defines the feed protocol. ||
|| || description || varchar(250) || No || Description of the feed protocol ||

 
= Definitions = 

|| *feed_direction_id* || *description* ||
|| request || Defines the feed as a request to be processed. ||
|| response || Defines a response feed to a previously processed request feed. ||
